Padding

# Padding

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class           | Support        |
| --------------- | -------------- |
| ```
p-{n}
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
p-[n]
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
px-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
px-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
py-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
py-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pt-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pt-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pr-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pr-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pb-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pb-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pl-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
pl-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
p-auto
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
px-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
py-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
pt-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
pr-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
pb-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
pl-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
